Key Match Events: James Rodríguez scored one goal and set up two more
Luis Díaz scored a goal at 41'
Richard Ríos scored a goal at 70'
Miguel Borja scored a penalty at 90'+4'
Colombia thoroughly dismantled Panama in a 5-0 win
Post-Match Reflections: Herculez Gomez: James Rodriguez is the best player in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: Second Half ends with Colombia 5, Panama 0
